TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {87130=Scott bikes are created with the following three words in mind; INNOVATION, TECHNOLOGY, DESIGN. With a long history of pioneering products for cycling, made to match everyones needs from World Champion racers to the casual weekend rider, Scott invest significant time and resources into creating world leading products that let you live the sport you love to the fullest. From 1992 when the first full suspension Scott bikes put tyre to trail, Scott also launched their range of helmets, shoes and clothing, with the same functionality, style and quality youd find in any of their bikes. Whether its racing to victory in the world famous stages races, taking on the enormity of the Cape Epic mountain bike stage race or just wanting a quality ride to get you round town, Scott offer a bike for every occasion, but never compromise on design. This ethos extends to the " Speedster range" :http://www.evanscycles.com/pages/scott-speedster-road-bikes, a lightweight road bike with great performance and the CR1, ideal for those riders looking for a first road bike.}
